segments.text: I'm Mary . I want to say I really admire the software you're designed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Easy stuff . But thanks . And the admiration is mutual .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're selling invoking subscriptions like nobody's business . And we don't even have a working demo yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't take the credit for that . I'm just Zina's assistant . She's the pro .
segments.speaker: S1
